content:
Kirschner family

1 Abraham KIRSCHNER                  1752-58 - 1836 #48
 + Bayli                             - before 1830 (Aron)
  2x Mojzesz KIRSCHNER               1808 - 1845-70
    + Sara KRAUSHAAR                 1809 Chrzanow - Dec 23, 1878 #525
          banns 1830 #29
     3x Joachym KIRSCHNER            1831 #171 - 1831 #314
     3o Scheindel KIRSCHNER          1832 #415 - 1834 #188
     3x Abbe Hirsch KIRSCHNER        1835 #133 - 1836 #256
     3x Juda KIRSCHNER               Nov 26, 1837 #577 - ?Apr 22, 1869 #164
     3o Pela Dwora KIRSCHNER         Nov 12, 1838 #485
     3o Baila KIRSCHNER              - 1840 #162
     3x Samuel KIRSCHNER             Oct 5, 1840 422 - 1847 #332
     3x Aron KIRSCHNER               Jan 27, 1844 #36
       + Flora JAFFE                 Jul 25/ Aug 8, 1854 Myslowice
     3x Lobel KIRSCHNER              Sep 12, 1845 #487 - 1845 #330
 + Hanny                             c1798 - 1838 #133 (Kalman)
  2x Jakob Jozef KIRSCHNER           1834 #314 - 1837 #224




     Jakob KIRSCHNER
    + Bazy STELMAN ? HELMAN
     3o Baila KIRSCHNER              1826
       * Salomon WACHSMAN            1829 #21 - ?Feb 3, 1889 #47
             married Jul 30, 1847 #33
           FAMILY LISTING

       + Gitel PEIPERL               1828 #270 - 1853 #23
             married Mar 4, 1852 #11
        4x Aron KIRSCHNER            Jun 25, 1850 #275 - 1851 #138

       + Laja PEIPERL                1834 #36
        4x Abba KIRSCHNER            Feb 8, 1855 #66
        4o Ryfka KIRSCHNER           Sledziejowice pt. Wieliczka
          * Psachie Leib MUECKENBRUN  May 10, 1865 Niepolomice
                banns 1892 #44,  married Mar 7, 1892
           5o Salomea MUECKENBRUN    Jun 25, 1893 #388
             * Samuel GRYSZPAN       Apr 22, 1889 #239
                   banns 1916 #279,  married May 4, 1916

                * Henryk GRYSZPAN    Jan 27, 1915 Krakow - after 1950

              6o Liana GRYSZPAN      Apr 11, 1925
           5x Jakob MUECKENBRUN      Jun 23, 1897 Krakow
             + Ewa MALINGER

             * Samuel KRANZ          Nov 2, 1892 Domaradz - after 1948
                   banns 1922 #829,  married Jun 8, 1922
              6o Anna Maria KRANZ    Mar 2, 1923
              6o Liliana KRANZ       Nov 30, 1925




     Lazar KIRSCHNER
    + Tonia DORSLER
     3x Maximilian KIRSCHNER         Apr 4, 1834 ?Bern Morawa
       + Drobne (Dorotea) BRENNER    1834 #597 - after 1900
             married Jan 15, 1860 #298
        4x Moritz KIRSCHNER          Jun 2, 1860 #2463
          + Ernestina POLLAK         Jun 7, 1865 (1867 #342)
                married Dec 26, 1893 #780 Vienna
           5o Wanda Rosalia KIRSCHNER  Oct 23, 1894 #710
           5o Olga KIRSCHNER         Aug 2, 1898 #503
             * Ferdynand LIPNER      Wieliczka
                   married Prog.Syn 1925 #763

          * Wilhelm /Wolf KLEINBERG  1865 Drohobyc

           5x Adam KIRSCHNER         Sep 16, 1911 #639
           5x Jakob KIRSCHNER        - after 1946
        4o Regina KIRSCHNER          Feb 15, 1870 #223

                banns 1907 #214

              FAMILY LISTING
        4o Liebe KIRSCHNER           1873 #92

                married May 3, 1904 #106

                   married 1935 Krakow
           5x Edward KIRSCHNER       Jul 17, 1909 #486 - after 1935
